mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lc_member_info VALUES ( #{lcMemberId}, #{lcMemberName}, (SELECT lcIdx FROM lc_info WHERE year=#{year} AND lc=#{lc}), #{isPeerLeader}, #{contact}, #{mail} )
mapper.select: SELECT lcMemberId, lcMemberName, year, lc, isPeerLeader, contact, mail FROM ( SELECT * FROM lc_member_info WHERE lcMemberId=${lcMemberId} ) AS S1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM lc_info ) AS S2 ON S1.lcIdx=S2.lcIdx
